definitions.definition: The act of attaching something with glue.
A connection between the edges of two planes , or between the points at the ends of two lines .
Any of various processes for producing some structure (e.g. a sheaf or scheme ) by combining smaller structures that are in some way compatible with each other.

main_definition: The act of attaching something with glue.
secondary_definitions: ( topology ) A connection between the edges of two planes , or between the points at the ends of two lines .
( mathematics ) Any of various processes for producing some structure (e.g. a sheaf or scheme ) by combining smaller structures that are in some way compatible with each other.
